description: Give your classic sausage roll recipe a twist with these party-perfect sausage roll scrolls. Ready in three steps, it's an easy choice for fuss-free entertaining.
name: Sausage Roll Scrolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g caramelised onion & Angus beef sausages
150 g roasted red capsicum, pecorino, cashews & basil dip

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 pastry sheet on a flat surface. Spread with one-third of the mince mixture, leaving a 3cm border at one end. Scatter over 1/2 cup cheese. Roll pastry towards end with border, enclosing filling. Brush with egg, then cut into 2cm-thick pieces and place, cut-sides down, on trays. Repeat with remaining pastry sheets, mince mixture, cheese and egg to make a total of 36 scrolls. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve scrolls with sauce.

Repeat with remaining pastry sheets, mince mixture, cheese and egg to make a total of 36 scrolls. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve scrolls with sauce.
